thread.title: Alec Baldwin Trolls Donald Trump With The Perfect Russian Language MAGA Hat! Look!
thread.title_full: Alec Baldwin Trolls Donald Trump With The Perfect Russian Language MAGA Hat! Look!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Alec Baldwin Trolls Donald Trump With The Perfect Russian Language MAGA Hat! Look!
text:
1/08/2017 5:04   TV News • Celebrity Feuds • Wacky, Tacky & True • Politik • Donald Trump • Alec Baldwin • Saturday Night Live • Instagram • Viral: News • Controversy 
Make America Great Again…. comrade?! 
Alec Baldwin is trolling Donald Trump on Instagram with the most perfect new hat to go along with The Donald's Make America Great Again line of red caps! 
As you can see (above), Baldwin got himself one with the same message as The Donald's typical fare… except in Russian!! 
Baldwin and Trump don't have the best relationship, of course ; the actor portrays Trump regularly on Saturday Night Live and, well, The Donald is not afraid to tweet about it and let his feelings be known ! 
But this… this is on another level, and SO perfect! 
For what it's worth, Trump hasn't really taken notice of the hat — at least not on social media — as the President-elect is instead focusing on a variety of other random things this weekend (below): 
I look very much forward to meeting Prime Minister Theresa May in Washington in the Spring. Britain, a longtime U.S. ally, is very special! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 8, 2017 
Congratulation to Jane Timken on her major upset victory in becoming the Ohio Republican Party Chair. Jane is a loyal Trump supporter & star — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 7, 2017 
Kellyanne Conway went to @MeetThePress this morning for an interview with @chucktodd . Dishonest media cut out 9 of her 10 minutes. Terrible! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 8, 2017 
Before I, or anyone, saw the classified and/or highly confidential hacking intelligence report, it was leaked out to @NBCNews . So serious! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 8, 2017 
So there you go.
